Review Title: Dishonest with minimal presence in US
Pros: This company in the US is bordering on fraud
Cons: I am a experienced consultant in the US. Nityo found me on a job board and asked me to subcontract for Infosys. They tried to switch the rate that we negotiated on the phone when I read my contract. I didn't get paid for 6 months after starting. No one picked up my phone calls. The one contact I had that was suppose to be in the US was obviously in India because the phone quickly forwarded to another ring tone. When I tried calling from another phone. He would pick up and pretend to not hear me and hang up. Bottom line, if they call you for a job, find an American agency to work through. This company is a joke.

Review Title: Unethical, ruined a great job offer
Pros: Nothing stood out as a reason to choose this company.
Cons: The recruiters forced me to sign over a full representation solely to them but then refused to represent me; I performed all of the duties myself.  I received an offer letter appearing to be from the client, but the recruiter refused to answer any questions or forward my questions to the client about the offer letter.  I decided to accept the offer and sent all of my information over to what I assume is the client, but I have not heard any response from the client, who now has all of my private info - including social security number and bank info.  The people at Nityo Infotech now will not answer my questions to tell me who I had been speaking with and who these people are, despite my questions and anxiety about having now sent all of my information off to some unknown group.  Occasionally a man will respond to my emails not with an answer, but just with a vague "I'll look into it," and never gets back to me.

Pros: HR and recruiter who is in contact with me through out the journey is good when asked for any concerns.

It's a body shop. They just care about the money and not about the employee

Review Title: Nityo Infotech provided me with an enriching professional experience
Pros: Working at Nityo Infotech offered several valuable advantages. The company's commitment to innovation and cutting-edge technologies created an exciting and dynamic atmosphere. The opportunities for career growth and professional development were impressive, with access to various training programs and workshops. The supportive and collaborative team culture fostered a sense of camaraderie and made tackling challenges enjoyable. Overall, Nityo Infotech provided a platform for me to learn, contribute, and thrive in my role.
Cons: While my experience at Nityo Infotech was generally positive, there were a few areas that could have been improved. Communication between departments sometimes seemed lacking, which occasionally led to misunderstandings or delays in project timelines. Additionally, there were moments when workload distribution could have been more balanced to prevent potential burnout among team members. Overall, though, these were relatively minor issues in an otherwise productive and fulfilling work environment.

Review Title: Warning!! Clients and candidates, stay away from this company!

The management is completely terrible, especially the HR. I have no idea how this toxic management is allowed to run the Hong Kong office!

Initially, they agree to everything when you are still deciding whether to join or not. But once you join, they never follow the contract, terms, conditions, or regulations that both parties signed. They will go to great lengths to avoid fulfilling any obligations.

This company is notorious, it has no reputation at all.
Please spread the word about their practices in the market! I hope that no more clients, companies, or candidates become victims anymore!

Pros: Not even a single one
Cons:
There are N number of Cons. First of all do not join this company at any cost, No doubt that they will give you more salary you can't even expect that but do not come in their sugar quoted words. At any point of time no one will support you ever be it senior level your reporting manager, team manager or even the HRs. This is a big fraud company who follow hire and fire policy. They hire people for only for 6-8 months and then they put their employees on PIPs and ask them to complete an unachievable target which anyone will not be able to do. No one here gives respect to sales people. Recruiters are king here, they can do work from home anytime and they can take as many leaves as they want because they have less salaries but sales person have no right to do work from home, they have to come even on a natural disaster situations. Egoistic management, arrogant management. their ego gets hurt when you put down your papers or you are leaving and they treat you like their slaves. So incase if you have any other offer inhand then go for that only. This company will never provide you career growth. Never do increment, Increment policy - only after 2 years that too in October or Novemeber, They will give you false hope that they will call you Onsite and all but trust me nothing will happen. They will scold you every day for not achieving your weekly targets and with the name of punishment they will call you on saturdays when no one is coming but you only you will come. Worst culture. Zero level of employee satisfaction. Not even a single get together will be conducted. You come you see dead faces in front of you looking into their systems and then go. No interaction between any employees also they will not provide you any training. You have to learn from your own.
If you are from solutions background then do involve in recruitment because this is totally a recruitment agency, this is not a solution company. Initially they will ask you that sell solutions but after 1 or 2 weeks they will ask you to sell recruitment for your survival. They have no Salary criteria for any level of people, your junior will be taking more salary with zero knowledge.
Diwali giftings is just Rs.501. No extra gift not even a single sweets.
Major one is Salary Delay- They will give you salary after 15th of every month infact they have policy of crediting the salary between 7-10 but they don't follow their own policy. 
There are more cons but I want to conclude that this is a worst company to join. If you wanna see worst culture in corporate sector then join this company otherwise take your time sit unemployed but do not join this company.

Review Title: Worst Work Culture. Hire & Fire Policy. Favouritism preferred over Hard work.

They hire Less exp. recruiters and fire them after 3 months due to zero deployment. Keep on target adding enterprises/Logos and nobody even looking growing the existing clients. They are lacking with the profiles on the active positions. Favourite employee got promoted with less exp. as a lead. Whatsapp is used for communicating internally and no MS Teams / Slack or G Suite. Even HR person doesn't have that much polite behaviour to communicate with the sales manager or account manager. If you are a girl, Looks are more preferred over the knowledge for sales domain. 10 Minutes interview with impressive profile picture will be sufficient for the selection.

Review Title: Perfect place to grow your career
Pros: Lots of Perks One of the obvious benefits of working for Nityo Infotech is that there are a lot of perks. Resources Nityo Infotech offer their employees “more,” because they have more resources. — Opportunities Working at Nityo infotech gives you many professional opportunities. For starters, it is a perfect Roadmap for success. — Structure and Order If you’re the kind of person that thrives in a structured environment, Nityo Infotech may be your thing. There are usually set training programs in place, so you learn all the things you need to do to get your job done. Training and policy manuals help guide you. And, there are almost always clear-cut procedures in place to help you make decisions.
Cons: No such Cons as of now.
